original_title: Navin Dissanayake to be appointed as a Governor?
original_body_lines: Former Minister Navin Dissanayake will reportedly be appointed as a provincial Governor next week.
Deputy Chairman of the United National Party, Presidential Adviser Ruwan Wijewardene stated that the appointment will possibly be made by next Tuesday (June 13).
He made this remark while responding to a few questions raised by the reporters in Gampaha yesterday.
